work in a hardware store and lumber yard that also mixes concrete
Doesn't your work supply protective gear??
sawdust, cement powder, silicate dusts from rock and dirt

yeah, while we are cutting wood and mixing concrete, but Ive been doing this since I was 16, before there was a requirement for it. Unless I wear a p100 mask all the time, which would need to be replaced every few hours
theres no way to protect against it all the time. So we only use them during heavy dust periods
